name: CAT & ONION
description:
A warm and whimsical cat adventure where you climb, talk, fly and smack your way to places where no cat has ever gone before!

Go on a short yet cosmic journey packed with curious characters, imaginative environments and good vibes.​




  • You play as a cat!
  • Talk, find items and use your abilities to go where no cat has ever gone before!
  • Meet a cast of entertaining characters
  • No combat, unless you count smacking stuff with a baseball bat
  • An imaginative world
  • Takes 30-60 minutes to finish: You'll experience a lot in a short time!
  • A jazzy soundtrack
  • Secret cat things for curious cats
  • Made by one person
  • Enjoy chunky pixelart, with a grand total of 8 colors!
  • Cat
